flashcards.kikuyu: Hûthîra ciugo ici gûtunga ûhoro wa maûndû megwîkîka
flashcards.english: Write these words in future tenses (practice exercise)
flashcards.notes: Exercise: Write verbs in two future forms - (1) A few moments later/anytime today, (2) Tomorrow or later. Example given: Rîa (eat) → 1. Ngûrîa, 2. Ngarîa
examples: Verbs to practice: Teng'era (run), Ikara (stay), Koma (sleep), Ona (see), Igua (hear)
More verbs: Îkîra (put), Ruga (cook), Aka (make/construct), Rîma (dig), Rûgama (stand)
